author: David Brennan
title: U.S. Coronavirus Death Toll Surpasses 7,000, Over 30,000 New Cases Reported on Friday
description: At least 30,000 new cases of the novel virus infections have brought the total number of infections to 278,000.
content: The U.S. reported more than 7,000 deaths from COVID-19 on Friday. At least 30,000 new cases of the novel virus infections have brought the total number of infections to 278,000. Friday represented the deadliest day in America's outbreak, with more than 1,400 … [+4127 chars]
